conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a high-quality isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation with clear thickness, height, and clean isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is highly faithful. Minor deduction: The external utility room orientation and toilet entry slightly differ from the 2D swing directions.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture accurately placed; laundry and kitchen elements well represented.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials and clear lighting. No UI clutter.

detected_errors.description: Door swing/opening for the bathroom and external accessibility slightly varies from 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and clean 3D isometric conversion that meticulously follows the provided 2D architectural layout and furniture scheme.
